title: looking for font ID and/or suggestion of similar font
author: luvtype

comments.content:
It could be **Brunel Poster (Semibold)** by Paul Barnes and Christian Schwartz [1995-2010].  
 [http://www.christianschwartz.com/brunel.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151713/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/brunel.shtml "http://www.christianschwartz.com/brunel.shtml")  
 [http://www.moderntypography.com/Typedesign/Brunel/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151713/http:/www.moderntypography.com/Typedesign/Brunel/index.html "http://www.moderntypography.com/Typedesign/Brunel/index.html")
